casebody.data:
ACCARDI
v.
HARTFORD UNDERWRITERS INSURANCE COMPANY 42A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 14, 2019 Daniel K. Bryson, J. Hunter Bryson, Attorneys at Law, for Accardi, Thomas. Stephen D. Feldman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kim E. Rinehart, David R. Roth, Attorneys at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Hartford Underwriters Insurance Company. Mark R. Sigmon, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for United Policyholders. Roger A. Peters, II, Attorney at Law, for American Property Casualty Insurance Association.

*722The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 13th of May 2019 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of May 2019."
